clParse
def clParse(
args,
flag,
numOfArgs = 1
)

CONVERT TO DESIRED TYPE IN CODE CALLING THIS arguments returned will always be string type args : (give it args) flag : (a string, "-o" for example) numOfArgs : number of arguments after the flag to return
